EmailTemplate.name: LI Error on Certificate of Rental
EmailTemplate.subject: Error on Certificate of Rental
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear License Holder,
The error has been corrected and the Certificate of Rental Suitability may now be generated. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.
Please reply to this email if you experience any further issues related to this.
Sincerely, Customer Care Staff Department of L & I
